node.title: 'One of his favourites': Second of four women takes stand at Ghislaine Maxwell trial
node.alt: A court sketch shows Ghislaine Maxwell, a brunette woman wearing a disposable face mask, sitting in a court room
node.description: A woman,Â testifying under the pseudonym Kate, tells a New York court she massaged Jeffrey Epstein at Ghislaine Maxwell's request and had sexual encounters with him as a teenager.
node.content:
["A second woman \u2014 who says Ghislaine Maxwell groomed her for abuse by late financier Jeffrey Epstein while she was a teenager \u2014 has testified that the British socialite \"told me I was one of his favourites\" after one of her encounters with Epstein.", "The woman, who is testifying under the pseudonym Kate, is the second of four women named in a 2021 indictment to take the stand at Ms Maxwell's sex abuse trial in Manhattan federal court.", "That\u00a0trial began last week, and is set to last into January.", "Kate said she was 17 and struggling to make friends after moving to Britain from France when she met Ms Maxwell for tea at her London townhouse in 1994, becoming acquainted through a 35-year-old man she was dating.", "Now in her mid-40s, Kate recounted how she was an aspiring musician, and Ms Maxwell offered to introduce her to her boyfriend, who could help her career.", "\"I left there feeling exhilarated and like somebody wanted to be my friend,\" Kate said.", "Because Kate was over the age of consent in Britain, US\u00a0District Judge Alison Nathan instructed the jury that any sexual encounters she described were not \"illegal sex acts\".", "Still, prosecutors could use Kate's testimony to corroborate patterns in Epstein's and Ms\u00a0Maxwell's behaviour that other witnesses describe, including that Ms Maxwell\u00a0doting on teenage girls was a means of grooming them for Epstein's abuse.", "Ms Maxwell, 59, has pleaded not guilty to eight counts of sex trafficking and other charges, and her lawyers say the memories of the four women have been corrupted over the decades that have passed since the alleged encounters.", "
'One of his favourites'
", "Kate said that upon returning to the townhouse several weeks after having tea, Epstein\u00a0was there.", "", "
Ghislaine Maxwell's lawyers argue she is only on trial because Epstein is dead.(AP: John Minchillo)
", "She said she massaged Epstein's feet at Ms Maxwell's request, with Epstein being impressed at how strong she was.", "Kate said Ms Maxwell asked her to come back to the house weeks later and give Epstein a massage.", "When asked by a prosecutor whether she was a massage therapist, Kate said no.", "Kate said Ms Maxwell led her to a massage room and\u00a0Epstein was there, wearing a bathrobe.", "Ms Maxwell closed the door, and Epstein had a sexual encounter with Kate. She said Ms Maxwell saw her after the encounter ended.", "\"She said, 'Did you have fun?\u00a0You're such a good girl.\u00a0I'm so happy you were able to come',\" Kate said.", "\"She sounded really pleased, and I was really pleased that she was pleased.\"", "Kate said that, after she turned 18, she went to see Ms Maxwell and Epstein at Epstein's estate in Palm Beach, where she and Epstein had a sexual encounter at the pool house.", "She said Ms Maxwell \"told me that I was such a good girl and that I was one of his favourites\".", "Lawyers for Ms Maxwell have said their client is being prosecuted only because Epstein is no longer alive.", "Epstein killed himself in 2019, at age 66, in a Manhattan jail cell.", "Last week, jurors heard from a woman known as Jane who said Epstein sexually abused her beginning in 1994 while she was 14.", "She alleged that Ms Maxwell\u00a0sometimes participated in their encounters, which often began as massages before escalating.", "Reuters"]
